member.name: T:InlineIL.FieldRef
member.summary: Represents a field reference.

member.name: M:InlineIL.FieldRef.#ctor(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a field reference.

member.name: T:InlineIL.GenericParameters
member.summary: Represents a list of generic parameters. Use the indexer to retrieve a given parameter.

member.name: P:InlineIL.GenericParameters.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the generic parameter type at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the generic parameter type to get.

member.name: T:InlineIL.IL
member.summary: Injects IL code to the calling method, using InlineIL.Fody. All method calls are replaced at weaving time.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.DeclareLocals(InlineIL.LocalVar[])
member.summary: Declares local variables, with the init flag set to true. These variables are appended to the ones already declared by the compiler, but indexes of emitted ldloc/stloc instructions are adjusted to account for that.
member.param: The list of local variable declarations.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.DeclareLocals(System.Boolean,InlineIL.LocalVar[])
member.summary: Declares local variables. These variables are appended to the ones already declared by the compiler, but indexes of emitted ldloc/stloc instructions are adjusted to account for that.
member.param: Flag which specifies if the local variables should be zero initialized. The default value is true. Setting this to false will cause the method to be unverifiable. It will also affect the initialization of locals emitted by the compiler.
The list of local variable declarations.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.MarkLabel(System.String)
member.summary: Marks the current code position with the given label.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Push``1(``0)
member.summary: Pushes a value onto the evaluation stack. The parameter should be a constant or an argument. Other values will either work correctly or cause a weaving-time error, depending on the surrounding code.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to push.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Push``1(``0@)
member.summary: Pushes a reference to a value onto the evaluation stack. The parameter should be an argument reference. Other values will either work correctly or cause a weaving-time error, depending on the surrounding code.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to push.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Push(System.Void*)
member.summary: Pushes a pointer onto the evaluation stack. The parameter should be an argument. Other values will either work correctly or cause a weaving-time error, depending on the surrounding code.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Pop``1(``0@)
member.summary: Pops a value from the top of the evaluation stack into a local variable.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to pop.
member.param: A reference to a local variable receiving the value.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Pop``1(``0*@)
member.summary: Pops a pointer from the top of the evaluation stack into a local variable.
member.typeparam: The type of the pointer to pop.
member.param: A reference to a local variable receiving the pointer.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Pop(System.Void*@)
member.summary: Pops a pointer from the top of the evaluation stack into a local variable.
member.param: A reference to a local variable receiving the pointer.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Unreachable
member.summary: Marks the given region of code as unreachable, for example just after a ret instruction. This method returns an which should be immediately thrown by the caller. It enables writing code with a valid control flow for compile-time.
member.returns: An which should be immediately thrown.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Return``1
member.summary: Returns the value on top of the evaluation stack. The return value of this method should be immediately returned from the weaved method. This is an alternative to emitting a ret instruction followed by a call to .
member.returns: The value on top of the evaluation stack, which should be immediately returned from the method.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.ReturnRef``1
member.summary: Returns the reference on top of the evaluation stack. The return value of this method should be immediately returned from the weaved method. This is an alternative to emitting a ret instruction followed by a call to .
member.returns: The reference on top of the evaluation stack, which should be immediately returned from the method.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.ReturnPointer``1
member.summary: Returns the pointer on top of the evaluation stack. The return value of this method should be immediately returned from the weaved method. This is an alternative to emitting a ret instruction followed by a call to .
member.returns: The pointer on top of the evaluation stack, which should be immediately returned from the method.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.ReturnPointer
member.summary: Returns the pointer on top of the evaluation stack. The return value of this method should be immediately returned from the weaved method. This is an alternative to emitting a ret instruction followed by a call to .
member.returns: The pointer on top of the evaluation stack, which should be immediately returned from the method.

member.name: T:InlineIL.IL.Emit
member.summary: Emits an IL instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Nop
member.summary:
nop - Fills space if opcodes are patched. No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Break
member.summary:
break - Signals the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_0
member.summary:
ldarg.0 - Loads the argument at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_1
member.summary:
ldarg.1 - Loads the argument at index 1 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_2
member.summary:
ldarg.2 - Loads the argument at index 2 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_3
member.summary:
ldarg.3 - Loads the argument at index 3 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_0
member.summary:
ldloc.0 - Loads the local variable at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_1
member.summary:
ldloc.1 - Loads the local variable at index 1 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_2
member.summary:
ldloc.2 - Loads the local variable at index 2 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_3
member.summary:
ldloc.3 - Loads the local variable at index 3 onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_0
member.summary:
stloc.0 - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index 0.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_1
member.summary:
stloc.1 - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index 1.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_2
member.summary:
stloc.2 - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index 2.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_3
member.summary:
stloc.3 - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index 3.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ldarg.s - Loads the argument (referenced by a specified short form index) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
ldarg.s - Loads the argument (referenced by a specified short form index) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarga_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ldarga.s - Load an argument address, in short form, onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarga_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
ldarga.s - Load an argument address, in short form, onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Starg_S(System.String)
member.summary:
starg.s - Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Starg_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
starg.s - Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ldloc.s - Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value
member.param: The local variable name, declared with .

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
ldloc.s - Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloca_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ldloca.s - Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I
member.param: The local variable name, declared with .

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloca_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
ldloca.s - Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_S(System.String)
member.summary:
stloc.s - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index (short form).
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...
member.param: The local variable name, declared with .

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc_S(System.Byte)
member.summary:
stloc.s - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index (short form).
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldnull
member.summary:
ldnull - Pushes a null reference (type O) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_M1
member.summary:
ldc.i4.m1 - Pushes the integer value of -1 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_0
member.summary:
ldc.i4.0 - Pushes the integer value of 0 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_1
member.summary:
ldc.i4.1 - Pushes the integer value of 1 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_2
member.summary:
ldc.i4.2 - Pushes the integer value of 2 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_3
member.summary:
ldc.i4.3 - Pushes the integer value of 3 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_4
member.summary:
ldc.i4.4 - Pushes the integer value of 4 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_5
member.summary:
ldc.i4.5 - Pushes the integer value of 5 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_6
member.summary:
ldc.i4.6 - Pushes the integer value of 6 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_7
member.summary:
ldc.i4.7 - Pushes the integer value of 7 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_8
member.summary:
ldc.i4.8 - Pushes the integer value of 8 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4_S(System.SByte)
member.summary:
ldc.i4.s - Pushes the supplied int8 value onto the evaluation stack as an int32, short form.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I4(System.Int32)
member.summary:
ldc.i4 - Pushes a supplied value of type int32 onto the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_I8(System.Int64)
member.summary:
ldc.i8 - Pushes a supplied value of type int64 onto the evaluation stack as an int64.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_R4(System.Single)
member.summary:
ldc.r4 - Pushes a supplied value of type float32 onto the evaluation stack as type F (float).
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., R4

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldc_R8(System.Double)
member.summary:
ldc.r8 - Pushes a supplied value of type float64 onto the evaluation stack as type F (float).
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Dup
member.summary:
dup - Copies the current topmost value on the evaluation stack, and then pushes the copy onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., value, value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Pop
member.summary:
pop - Removes the value currently on top of the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Jmp(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
jmp - Exits current method and jumps to specified method.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Call(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
call - Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.
Stack Transition: ..., arg0, arg1, ..., argN -> ..., return value (if callee does not return void)

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Calli(InlineIL.StandAloneMethodSig)
member.summary:
calli - Calls the method indicated on the evaluation stack (as a pointer to an entry point) with arguments described by a calling convention.
Stack Transition: ..., arg0, arg1, ..., argN -> ..., return value (if callee does not return void)

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ret
member.summary:
ret - Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., return value (if method does not return void) -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Br_S(System.String)
member.summary:
br.s - Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction (short form).
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Brfalse_S(System.String)
member.summary:
brfalse.s - Transfers control to a target instruction if value is false, a null reference, or zero.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Brtrue_S(System.String)
member.summary:
brtrue.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if value is true, not null, or non-zero.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Beq_S(System.String)
member.summary:
beq.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if two values are equal.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bge_S(System.String)
member.summary:
bge.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bgt_S(System.String)
member.summary:
bgt.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ble_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ble.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than or equal to the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Blt_S(System.String)
member.summary:
blt.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bne_Un_S(System.String)
member.summary:
bne.un.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) when two unsigned integer values or unordered float values are not equal.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bge_Un_S(System.String)
member.summary:
bge.un.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bgt_Un_S(System.String)
member.summary:
bgt.un.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ble_Un_S(System.String)
member.summary:
ble.un.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Blt_Un_S(System.String)
member.summary:
blt.un.s - Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Br(System.String)
member.summary:
br - Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Brfalse(System.String)
member.summary:
brfalse - Transfers control to a target instruction if value is false, a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), or zero.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Brtrue(System.String)
member.summary:
brtrue - Transfers control to a target instruction if value is true, not null, or non-zero.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Beq(System.String)
member.summary:
beq - Transfers control to a target instruction if two values are equal.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bge(System.String)
member.summary:
bge - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bgt(System.String)
member.summary:
bgt - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ble(System.String)
member.summary:
ble - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than or equal to the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Blt(System.String)
member.summary:
blt - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than the second value.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bne_Un(System.String)
member.summary:
bne.un - Transfers control to a target instruction when two unsigned integer values or unordered float values are not equal.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bge_Un(System.String)
member.summary:
bge.un - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Bgt_Un(System.String)
member.summary:
bgt.un - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ble_Un(System.String)
member.summary:
ble.un - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Blt_Un(System.String)
member.summary:
blt.un - Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Switch(System.String[])
member.summary:
switch - Implements a jump table.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_I1
member.summary:
ldind.i1 - Loads a value of type int8 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_U1
member.summary:
ldind.u1 - Loads a value of type unsigned int8 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_I2
member.summary:
ldind.i2 - Loads a value of type int16 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_U2
member.summary:
ldind.u2 - Loads a value of type unsigned int16 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_I4
member.summary:
ldind.i4 - Loads a value of type int32 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_U4
member.summary:
ldind.u4 - Loads a value of type unsigned int32 as an int32 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_I8
member.summary:
ldind.i8 - Loads a value of type int64 as an int64 onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_I
member.summary:
ldind.i - Loads a value of type native int as a native int onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_R4
member.summary:
ldind.r4 - Loads a value of type float32 as a type F (float) onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., R4

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_R8
member.summary:
ldind.r8 - Loads a value of type float64 as a type F (float) onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldind_Ref
member.summary:
ldind.ref - Loads an object reference as a type O (object reference) onto the evaluation stack indirectly.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_Ref
member.summary:
stind.ref - Stores a object reference value at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_I1
member.summary:
stind.i1 - Stores a value of type int8 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_I2
member.summary:
stind.i2 - Stores a value of type int16 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_I4
member.summary:
stind.i4 - Stores a value of type int32 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_I8
member.summary:
stind.i8 - Stores a value of type int64 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I8 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_R4
member.summary:
stind.r4 - Stores a value of type float32 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, R4 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_R8
member.summary:
stind.r8 - Stores a value of type float64 at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, R8 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Add
member.summary:
add - Adds two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Sub
member.summary:
sub - Subtracts one value from another and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Mul
member.summary:
mul - Multiplies two values and pushes the result on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Div
member.summary:
div - Divides two values and pushes the result as a floating-point (type F) or quotient (type int32) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Div_Un
member.summary:
div.un - Divides two unsigned integer values and pushes the result (int32) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Rem
member.summary:
rem - Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Rem_Un
member.summary:
rem.un - Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.And
member.summary:
and - Computes the bitwise AND of two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Or
member.summary:
or - Compute the bitwise complement of the two integer values on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Xor
member.summary:
xor - Computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the evaluation stack, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Shl
member.summary:
shl - Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Shr
member.summary:
shr - Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Shr_Un
member.summary:
shr.un - Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Neg
member.summary:
neg - Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Not
member.summary:
not - Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_I1
member.summary:
conv.i1 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int8, then extends (pads) it to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_I2
member.summary:
conv.i2 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int16, then extends (pads) it to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_I4
member.summary:
conv.i4 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_I8
member.summary:
conv.i8 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int64.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_R4
member.summary:
conv.r4 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to float32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., R4

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_R8
member.summary:
conv.r8 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to float64.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_U4
member.summary:
conv.u4 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int32, and extends it to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_U8
member.summary:
conv.u8 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int64, and extends it to int64.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Callvirt(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
callvirt - Calls a late-bound method on an object, pushing the return value onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., arg0, arg1, ..., argN -> ..., return value (if callee does not return void)

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Cpobj(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
cpobj - Copies the value type located at the address of an object (type &, * or native int) to the address of the destination object (type &, * or native int).
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldobj(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
ldobj - Copies the value type object pointed to by an address to the top of the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldstr(System.String)
member.summary:
ldstr - Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Newobj(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
newobj - Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type O) onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., arg0, arg1, ..., argN -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Castclass(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
castclass - Attempts to cast an object passed by reference to the specified class.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Isinst(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
isinst - Tests whether an object reference (type O) is an instance of a particular class.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_R_Un
member.summary:
conv.r.un - Converts the unsigned integer value on top of the evaluation stack to float32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Unbox(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
unbox - Converts the boxed representation of a value type to its unboxed form.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Throw
member.summary:
throw - Throws the exception object currently on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldfld(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
ldfld - Finds the value of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldflda(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
ldflda - Finds the address of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stfld(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
stfld - Replaces the value stored in the field of an object reference or pointer with a new value.
Stack Transition: ..., O, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldsfld(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
ldsfld - Pushes the value of a static field onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldsflda(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
ldsflda - Pushes the address of a static field onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stsfld(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
stsfld - Replaces the value of a static field with a value from the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stobj(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
stobj - Copies a value of a specified type from the evaluation stack into a supplied memory address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I1_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i1.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int8 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I2_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i2.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int16 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I4_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i4.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I8_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i8.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int64, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U1_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u1.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int8 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U2_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u2.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int16 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U4_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u4.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U8_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u8.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int64, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed native int, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U_Un
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u.un - Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned native int, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Box(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
box - Converts a value type to an object reference (type O).
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Newarr(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
newarr - Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldlen
member.summary:
ldlen - Pushes the number of elements of a zero-based, one-dimensional array onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelema(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
ldelema - Loads the address of the array element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type & (managed pointer).
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_I1
member.summary:
ldelem.i1 - Loads the element with type int8 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_U1
member.summary:
ldelem.u1 - Loads the element with type unsigned int8 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_I2
member.summary:
ldelem.i2 - Loads the element with type int16 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_U2
member.summary:
ldelem.u2 - Loads the element with type unsigned int16 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_I4
member.summary:
ldelem.i4 - Loads the element with type int32 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_U4
member.summary:
ldelem.u4 - Loads the element with type unsigned int32 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int32.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_I8
member.summary:
ldelem.i8 - Loads the element with type int64 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as an int64.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_I
member.summary:
ldelem.i - Loads the element with type native int at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as a native int.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_R4
member.summary:
ldelem.r4 - Loads the element with type float32 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type F (float).
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., R4

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_R8
member.summary:
ldelem.r8 - Loads the element with type float64 at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type F (float).
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_Ref
member.summary:
ldelem.ref - Loads the element containing an object reference at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type O (object reference).
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., O

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_I
member.summary:
stelem.i - Replaces the array element at a given index with the native int value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_I1
member.summary:
stelem.i1 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the int8 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_I2
member.summary:
stelem.i2 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the int16 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_I4
member.summary:
stelem.i4 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the int32 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_I8
member.summary:
stelem.i8 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the int64 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, I8 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_R4
member.summary:
stelem.r4 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the float32 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, R4 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_R8
member.summary:
stelem.r8 - Replaces the array element at a given index with the float64 value on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, R8 -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_Ref
member.summary:
stelem.ref - Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type O) on the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, O -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldelem_Any(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
ldelem.any - Loads the element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as the type specified in the instruction.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stelem_Any(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
stelem.any - Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.
Stack Transition: ..., O, I, O -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Unbox_Any(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
unbox.any - Converts the boxed representation of a type specified in the instruction to its unboxed form.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I1
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i1 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int8 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U1
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u1 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int8 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I2
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i2 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int16 and extending it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U2
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u2 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int16 and extends it to int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I4
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i4 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U4
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u4 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int32, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I8
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i8 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed int64, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U8
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u8 - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int64, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Refanyval(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
refanyval - Retrieves the address (type &) embedded in a typed reference.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ckfinite
member.summary:
ckfinite - Throws if value is not a finite number.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., R8

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Mkrefany(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
mkrefany - Pushes a typed reference to an instance of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldtoken(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
ldtoken - Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldtoken(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
ldtoken - Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldtoken(InlineIL.FieldRef)
member.summary:
ldtoken - Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_U2
member.summary:
conv.u2 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int16, and extends it to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_U1
member.summary:
conv.u1 - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned int8, and extends it to int32.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_I
member.summary:
conv.i - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to native int.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_I
member.summary:
conv.ovf.i - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed native int, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_Ovf_U
member.summary:
conv.ovf.u - Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned native int, throwing on overflow.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Add_Ovf
member.summary:
add.ovf - Adds two integers, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Add_Ovf_Un
member.summary:
add.ovf.un - Adds two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Mul_Ovf
member.summary:
mul.ovf - Multiplies two integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Mul_Ovf_Un
member.summary:
mul.ovf.un - Multiplies two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Sub_Ovf
member.summary:
sub.ovf - Subtracts one integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Sub_Ovf_Un
member.summary:
sub.ovf.un - Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Endfinally
member.summary:
endfinally - Transfers control from the fault or finally clause of an exception block back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Leave(System.String)
member.summary:
leave - Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a specific target instruction.
Stack Transition: clears the stack

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Leave_S(System.String)
member.summary:
leave.s - Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a target instruction (short form).
Stack Transition: clears the stack

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stind_I
member.summary:
stind.i - Stores a value of type native int at a supplied address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Conv_U
member.summary:
conv.u - Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to unsigned native int, and extends it to native int.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Arglist
member.summary:
arglist - Returns an unmanaged pointer to the argument list of the current method.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ceq
member.summary:
ceq - Compares two values. If they are equal, the integer value 1 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Cgt
member.summary:
cgt - Compares two values. If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Cgt_Un
member.summary:
cgt.un - Compares two unsigned or unordered values. If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Clt
member.summary:
clt - Compares two values. If the first value is less than the second, the integer value 1 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Clt_Un
member.summary:
clt.un - Compares the unsigned or unordered values value1 and value2. If value1 is less than value2, then the integer value 1 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (int32) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., value, value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldftn(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
ldftn - Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type native int) to the native code implementing a specific method onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldvirtftn(InlineIL.MethodRef)
member.summary:
ldvirtftn - Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type native int) to the native code implementing a particular virtual method associated with a specified object onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., O -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg(System.String)
member.summary:
ldarg - Loads an argument (referenced by a specified index value) onto the stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarg(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
ldarg - Loads an argument (referenced by a specified index value) onto the stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarga(System.String)
member.summary:
ldarga - Load an argument address onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldarga(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
ldarga - Load an argument address onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Starg(System.String)
member.summary:
starg - Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Starg(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
starg - Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc(System.String)
member.summary:
ldloc - Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloc(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
ldloc - Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., value

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloca(System.String)
member.summary:
ldloca - Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Ldloca(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
ldloca - Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc(System.String)
member.summary:
stloc - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at a specified index.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Stloc(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
stloc - Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at a specified index.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Localloc
member.summary:
localloc - Allocates a certain number of bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and pushes the address (a transient pointer, type *) of the first allocated byte onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Endfilter
member.summary:
endfilter - Transfers control from the filter clause of an exception back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Unaligned(System.Byte)
member.summary:
unaligned. - Indicates that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following ldind, stind, ldfld, stfld, ldobj, stobj, initblk, or cpblk instruction.
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Volatile
member.summary:
volatile. - Specifies that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might be volatile, and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed.
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Tail
member.summary:
tail. - Performs a postfixed method call instruction such that the current method's stack frame is removed before the actual call instruction is executed.
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Initobj(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
initobj - Initializes each field of the value type at a specified address to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type.
Stack Transition: ..., I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Constrained(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
constrained. - Constrains the type on which a virtual method call is made.
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Cpblk
member.summary:
cpblk - Copies a specified number bytes from a source address to a destination address.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Initblk
member.summary:
initblk - Initializes a specified block of memory at a specific address to a given size and initial value.
Stack Transition: ..., I, I, I -> ...

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.No(System.Byte)
member.summary:
no. - Indicates that the subsequent instruction need not perform the specified fault check when it is executed. Currently not implemented in the CLR.
0x01 = typecheck (castclass, unbox, ldelema, stelem, stelem)
0x02 = rangecheck (ldelem.*, ldelema, stelem.*)
0x04 = nullcheck (ldfld, stfld, callvirt, ldvirtftn, ldelem.*, stelem.*, ldelema)
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Rethrow
member.summary:
rethrow - Rethrows the current exception.
Stack Transition: none

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Sizeof(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary:
sizeof - Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.
Stack Transition: ... -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Refanytype
member.summary:
refanytype - Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.
Stack Transition: ..., value -> ..., I

member.name: M:InlineIL.IL.Emit.Readonly
member.summary:
readonly. - Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.
This is a prefix instruction.

member.name: T:InlineIL.LocalVar
member.summary: Represents a local variable declaration, for use with .

member.name: M:InlineIL.LocalVar.#ctor(System.String,InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary: Constructs a named local variable, which can be accessed by name or by index.

member.name: M:InlineIL.LocalVar.#ctor(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary: Constructs an anonymous local variable, which can be accessed by index.

member.name: M:InlineIL.LocalVar.op_Implicit(System.Type)~InlineIL.LocalVar
member.summary: Converts a to a .

member.name: M:InlineIL.LocalVar.Pinned
member.summary: Makes the object referred to by the local pinned in memory, which prevents the garbage collector from moving it.

member.name: T:InlineIL.MethodRef
member.summary: Represents a method reference.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.#ctor(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference for a non-overloaded method.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.#ctor(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String,InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Constructs a method reference.
member.param: The types of the method parameters. Use the and static properties from the class to represent generic parameter types.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.#ctor(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String,System.Int32,InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Constructs a method reference.
member.param: The generic parameter count. Use 0 for a non-generic method.
The types of the method parameters. Use the and static properties from the class to represent generic parameter types.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.PropertyGet(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to a property getter.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.PropertySet(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to a property setter.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.EventAdd(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to the add method of an event.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.EventRemove(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to the remove method of an event.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.EventRaise(InlineIL.TypeRef,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to the raise method of an event.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.Constructor(InlineIL.TypeRef,InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to a constructor (.ctor method).
member.param: The types of the constructor parameters. Use the static property from the class to represent generic parameter types.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.TypeInitializer(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary: Constructs a method reference to a type initializer (.cctor method).

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.MakeGenericMethod(InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Returns a reference to a constructed generic method, using the supplied generic parameter types.
member.param: An array of type references to be substituted for the type parameters of the current generic method.
member.returns: A reference to a generic method instance.

member.name: M:InlineIL.MethodRef.WithOptionalParameters(InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Returns a reference to a varargs method instantiation, using the supplied optional parameter types.
member.returns: A reference to a varargs method instance.

member.name: T:InlineIL.StandAloneMethodSig
member.summary: Represents a stand-alone method signature, for use with .

member.name: M:InlineIL.StandAloneMethodSig.#ctor(System.Runtime.InteropServices.CallingConvention,InlineIL.TypeRef,InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Constructs an unmanaged method signature for the calli opcode.

member.name: M:InlineIL.StandAloneMethodSig.#ctor(System.Reflection.CallingConventions,InlineIL.TypeRef,InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Constructs a managed method signature for the calli opcode.

member.name: M:InlineIL.StandAloneMethodSig.WithOptionalParameters(InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Specifies the optional parameter types for a managed varargs method call.
member.returns: A reference to a varargs method call signature.

member.name: T:InlineIL.TypeRef
member.summary: Represents a type reference. This class is implicitly convertible from .

member.name: P:InlineIL.TypeRef.CoreLibrary
member.summary: Returns the core library name, for use with

member.name: P:InlineIL.TypeRef.TypeGenericParameters
member.summary: Generic parameters of the declaring type, for overload resolution in . Generic parameters of a nested type come after generic parameters of its enclosing type.

member.name: P:InlineIL.TypeRef.MethodGenericParameters
member.summary: Generic parameters of the method, for overload resolution in .

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Constructs a type reference from a .

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a type reference.
member.param: The assembly name containing the type. This assembly should be referenced by the weaved assembly.
The full runtime type name, as returned by .

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.op_Implicit(System.Type)~InlineIL.TypeRef
member.summary: Converts a to a .

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.MakePointerType
member.summary: Returns a type that represents a pointer to the current type.
member.returns: A that represents a pointer to the current type.

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.MakeByRefType
member.summary: Returns a type that represents a reference to the current type.
member.returns: A that represents a reference to the current type.

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.MakeArrayType
member.summary: Returns a type that represents a one-dimensional array of the current type.
member.returns: A that represents a one-dimensional array of the current type.

member.summary: Returns a type that represents an array of the current type, with the specified number of dimensions.
member.param: The number of dimensions for the array.
member.returns: A that represents an array of the current type.

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.MakeGenericType(InlineIL.TypeRef[])
member.summary: Returns a type that represents a constructed generic type.
member.param: An array of type references to be substituted for the type parameters of the current generic type.
member.returns: A that represents a constructed generic type.

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.WithOptionalModifier(InlineIL.TypeRef)
member.summary: Returns a type with an applied custom optional modifier (modopt).
member.returns: A with the custom modifier applied.

member.name: M:InlineIL.TypeRef.WithRequiredModifier(InlineIL.TypeRef)
